name: Back Button
author: Giannopoulos Nikolaos

sections.description: A simple back button added to all post types edit page. You can filter and navigate to posts lists without worrying about updating the post and lose the posts before.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload back-button.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
